reviewText: Danni Ashe videos are about as good as they get for soft porn.  There's no male interaction here, but there are some absolutely beautiful, amply endowed women. Danni, of course, is spectacular and Aria Giovanni is better on video than in any picture you might see of her (and there are plenty around).  Is this Danni's best video?  Maybe not, but it's so much better than any of the others without Danni Ashe's name attached.

I'm a big fan of Danni Ashe and her fabulous set of DVDs. She really knows what turns people on, such as plenty of hands on activities. So many similar DVDs are cold by comparison, with women just posing as if they were statues instead of acting like real women. But Danni and her ladies really get into this and seem to enjoy turning us on.

"Danni's Exotic Beauties" is one of Danni's series of DVDs in the interview/striptease format she's done several times, wherein Danni or someone else interviews each of the featured ladies for 2 to 3 minutes, with both of them in the buff, then the interviewee does a striptease for about 5 minutes. I like the interview idea a lot, since it gives us a sense of what the ladies are like personally, and with them in the buff and usually talking about sex I find them to be quite stimulating discussions. And this DVD certainly has sexy women on it, with Mason Marconi, Aria Giovanni, Nikki Nova, Linn Thomas, Mercedez, Akira Lane, and Danni all doing stripteases, while the also gorgeous Elexis Monroe, Tanya Danielle, and Kelly Madison help with the interviews. Two of the six striptease segments are girl/girl, including a hot one with Danni and Aria, and there's also a 30-minute bonus interview with the two of them. So if you like Aria Giovanni, who is certainly a bodacious babe, this is a great DVD for you! Incidentally, picture quality on this DVD is very good, it has generally good camerawork, and has a menu that functions well.

To sum up, my favorite of Danni's DVDs in this interview/striptease format is "Danni's International Beauties," which overall is done a little better than "Danni's Exotic Beauties." And my very favorite of all of Danni's DVDs that I've seen is "Danni's Wet Adventures," which is not in this format, but rather has ladies in all kinds of watery environments. However, although "Danni's Exotic Beauties" is not my favorite, it'll surely fire you up like it does me.

Bought Danni's Sexy Nurses and was impressed by the number and quality of the babes and the heat of the action. As a result, I bought a few other Danni DVDs. Exotic Beauties was a disappointment.

First of all, DVD menu quality is low - the Danni DVDs seem to suffer from bad/cheap chaptering - "Play Movie" may sometimes pop you out back to the menu (no huge deal).

Unlike 'Nurses', the scenes contain a lot of filler involving the girls lounging around on a bed and supposedly answering questions as they come in from callers. Mostly the same, dumb questions you always hear (what's the weirdest place you've had sex). Ok, but when you're geared up to see hot babes stripping and spreading, the chattiness and girly goofiness gets annoying.

Highlights were Nikki Nova (always goes all out, and it was nice to hear her talk a little bit for once - but NOT about her BOYFRIEND), Aria (very sexy, not enough pink), Danni (great set on her) & Linn Thomas (cute w/ some nice toy action). In conclusion, too many silly costumes, too much talking, not enough girls (maybe about 5 or 6) and not enough pink (we get some nice spreads, but not enough compared to the other fluff). And BTW, the babes (while sexy) aren't really all that exotic. Probably 2.5 stars.
